Detail.title: MK2-Superlaser
Detail.idDetail: 1 MK2-Superlaser was the primary weapon of the StarKiller Base, a powerful laser weapon. It was powered by eight kyber crystals. Laser beams generated from these crystals were focused and combined into a single blast of incredible power, capable of destroying an entire planet at full output detall.png

Detail.title: Energy Supply
Detail.idDetail: 2 As Starkiller Base was charged through the power of stars, it gradually blocked out sunlight until, running at full capacity, it extinguished it completely, leaving the surface in darkness. In order for the weapon to fire, its weapons engineers would induce a breach in the containment field, allowing the collected dark energy to escape the core through the hollow cylindrical opening on the antipodes of the planet relative to the stellar collector. During this process, the dark energy transformed to a state known as "phantom energy", and left the planet behind, tearing a hole through hyperspace along a perfectly linear path. detall3.png

Detail.title: StarKiller Base
Detail.idDetail: 3 Starkiller Base was a base located in the forested ice planet of Ilum rich in kyber crystals that was located in the Unknown Regions. The weapon was powered by a type of dark energy called "quintessence", which was ubiquitous in the universe, and offered a practically unlimited power source to the First Order. Using a star as a power source, an array of collectors on one side of the planet would gather dark energy in stages, redirecting it to the planetary core, DS3D.png

Detail.textDetail: The super laser has a large lens for focusing rays from 8 auxiliary lasers.The reactor acts as a small sun that powers the laser so that it can convert its energy into a large beam
The regular crew of the base consists of 250000 operators and also has 25000 StormTroopers for its protection.In addition, it can transport more than 7000 ships and 1400 AT-AT Walkers
For greater control, the base has been sectored in 24 zones. Each of these areas is organized into 6 departments: General, Security, Technical, Command, Military and Service

For your security the base has different defense systems such as the tractor beam system and the TIE-Fighters landing bays & docks located in the main trench and around 2500 laser cannons and 2500 ion turrets spread throughout its surface.
